title: Arise Sweet Sarah (2015)
overview: As told through a powerful combination of song, dance, narration and symbolism, Arise Sweet Sarah shares one woman's journey of choices and rise to healing in the arms of her King. Dance with Sarah through the stages of her life and the choices she makes, as she discovers the power of love, forgiveness and joy.
